com.dreamlink.aidl

接口 OnCommunicationListenerExternal

  • 所有已知实现类:
    OnCommunicationListenerExternal.Stub

    public interface OnCommunicationListenerExternal

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  OnCommunicationListenerExternal.Stub
      Local-side IPC implementation stub class.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void onReceiveMessage(byte[] msg, User sendUser)
      Received a message from user.
      void onUserConnected(User user)
      There is new user connected.
      void onUserDisconnected(User user)
      There is a user disconnected.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onReceiveMessage

        void onReceiveMessage(byte[] msg,
                    User sendUser)
                      throws RemoteException
        Received a message from user.
        Be careful, this method is not run in UI thread. If do UI operation, we can use Handler to do UI operation.
        参数:
        msg - the message.
        sendUser - the message from.
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • onUserConnected

        void onUserConnected(User user)
                     throws RemoteException
        There is new user connected.
        参数:
        user - the connected user
        抛出:
        RemoteException

      • onUserDisconnected

        void onUserDisconnected(User user)
                        throws RemoteException
        There is a user disconnected.
        参数:
        user - the disconnected user
        抛出:
        RemoteException
